name: Digital Man
description:
Hello Reader And Welcome To My First Game The Game Called Digital Man So You In This Game You Need To Help The Digital Man To Defend His System Against Viruses By Throwing Ninja Stars Towards Them Fancy Right so Try To Avoid Touching Enemies I Will Let You Discover The Game With Yourself After Downloading it Updates Are Coming Everyday so Make Sure You Download The Game From Time to Time :] So Have a Nice Day and Good Luck out_There And in The Game!!

For Cheat Codes try Contact Me on My FB here.
